segments.text: I have been having a lot of headaches lately .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you been having these headaches for a long time ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have had headaches my whole life , but they have been getting worse lately .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you been under a lot of stress lately ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I â€™ Ve been under stress , but no more than usual .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you been getting enough sleep lately ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I only sleep a few hours a night .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you had any head injuries lately ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , actually I fell skiing last week and hit my head .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am going to send you for a CT scan , and I will see you again when we see the results .
segments.speaker: S2
